</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.95PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	License agreement:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.6PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 35.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.6PT">
	The Corporation was initially committed under a license agreement to pay Neptune until the expiration of Neptune&#8217;s patents on licensed intellectual property, a royalty in relation to sales of products in the licensed field.&#160; In fiscal 2014, the Corporation exercised its option under the License Agreement to pay in advance all of the future royalties payable under the license by issuing 675,000 Class A shares, at a price of $23.00 per share to Neptune.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.6PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 35.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.6PT">
	The value of the prepayment, determined with the assistance of outside valuations specialists, using the pre-established formula set forth in the license agreement (adjusted to reflect the royalties of $395,068 accrued from December 4, 2012, the date at which the Corporation entered into the prepayment agreement to July 12, 2013, the date of issuance of the shares) totalling $15,129,932, was recognized as an intangible asset.&#160; The shares issued as a result of this transaction corresponded to an increase in share capital of $15,525,000, net of $29,000 of share issue costs.&#160; The Corporation no longer has a royalty payment commitment under the License Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	Research and development agreements:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	In the normal course of business, the Corporation has signed agreements with various partners and suppliers for them to execute research projects and to produce and market certain products.&#160; The Corporation has reserved certain rights relating to these projects.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	The Corporation initiated research and development projects that will be conducted over a 12&#160;to 24 month period for a total cost of $7,776,061, of which an amount of $1,966,950 has been paid to date.&#160; As at February 29, 2016, an amount of $450,931 is included in ''Trade and other payables'' in relation to these projects.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	During the year, the Corporation entered into a contract to purchase research and development equipment for $2,271,267 to be used in the clinical and future commercial supply of
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	CaPre&#174;.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 35.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.95PT">
	Contingency:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.95PT">
	&#160;

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 35.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.1PT">
	A former CEO of the Corporation is claiming the payment of approximately $8,500,000 and the issuance of equity instruments. As the Corporation&#8217;s management believes that these claims are not valid, no provision has been recognized. As of the date of these financial statements, no agreement has been reached. Neptune and its subsidiaries also filed an additional claim to recover certain amounts from the officer. All outstanding share-based payments held by the former CEO have been cancelled during the year ended February 28, 2015.

	ACASTI PHARMA INC.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: -9PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	Notes to Financial Statements, continued
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT">

</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 1PT">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.65PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	21.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Determination of fair values:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.65PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	Certain of the Corporation&#8217;s accounting policies and disclosures require the determination of fair value, for both financial and non-financial assets and liabilities.&#160; Fair values have been determined for measurement and/or disclosure purposes based on the following methods.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	Financial and non-financial assets and liabilities:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	In establishing fair value, the Corporation uses a fair value hierarchy based on levels as defined below:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="9B9185D7E8BE4FF8BEE6D631D34A826B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#9679;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	Level 1: defined as observable inputs such as quoted prices in active markets.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="C62F90E2322A45ADB9BFBE96B0AE7E9F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#9679;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	Level 2: defined as inputs other than quoted prices in active markets that are either directly or indirectly observable.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="A876F0FEDCD24EB28C9597982BE62760" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 9PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#9679;
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: AUTO; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	Level 3: defined as inputs that are based on little or no little observable market data, therefore requiring entities to develop their own assumptions.
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.95PT">
	The Corporation has determined that the carrying values of its short-term financial assets and liabilities approximate their fair value given the short-term nature of these instruments. The carrying value of the restricted short-term investment also approximates its fair value given the short-term maturity of the reinvested funds.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.95PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Derivative warrant liabilities:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Corporation measured its Derivative warrant liabilities at fair value on a recurring basis. These financial liabilities were measured using a level 3 input.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	The fair value was estimated according to the Black-Scholes option pricing model and based on the following assumptions:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.1PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.95PT">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER">
	&#160;(1)
</SUP>
	In order to obtain one share of Acasti, 10 warrants must be exercised.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 9.1PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.95PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The fair value of the Warrants issued was determined to be $0.09 per warrant as at February 29, 2016 ($1.30 per warrant &#8211; 2015).
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The effect of an increase or a decrease of 5% of the volatility used, which is the significant unobservable input in the fair value estimate, would result in a loss of $58,636 or a gain of $48,812, respectively.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The reconciliation of changes in level 3 fair value measurements of financial liabilities for the year ended February 29, 2016 and February 28, 2015 is presented in the following table:
</DIV>

</DIV>

	&#160;

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 19.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 14PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	ACASTI PHARMA INC.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; TEXT-INDENT: -9PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 9PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	Notes to Financial Statements, continued
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	Years ended February 29, 2016 and February 28, 2015 and 2014
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 14.4PT">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 1PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 0PT">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.65PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	21.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Determination of fair values (continued):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; TEXT-INDENT: 7.2PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 10.65PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.95PT">
	Share-based payment transactions:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; TEXT-INDENT: 7.2PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 10.65PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.95PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	The fair value of share-based payment transaction is measured based on the Black-Scholes valuation model.&#160; Measurement inputs include share price on measurement date, exercise price of the instrument, expected volatility (based on weighted average historic volatility), weighted average expected life of the instruments (based on historical experience and general option holder behaviour), expected dividends, and the risk-free interest rate (based on government bonds). Service and non-market performance conditions attached to the transactions, if any, are not taken into account in determining fair value.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 14PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.95PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	22.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; DISPLAY: INLINE-BLOCK; FONT-SIZE: 1PX">
	&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Capital management:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.95PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	Since inception, the Corporation&#8217;s objective in managing capital is to ensure sufficient liquidity to finance its research and development activities, general and administrative expenses, expenses associated with intellectual property protection and its overall capital expenditures.&#160; The Corporation is not exposed to external requirements by regulatory agencies or third parties regarding its capital.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	Since the beginning of its operations, the Corporation has financed its liquidity needs from funding provided by a public offering, a private placement, its parent corporation, from the exercise of warrants that were distributed to its parent corporation&#8217;s shareholders, from a rights offering and from the issuance of options to employees.&#160; The Corporation attempts to optimize its liquidity needs with non-dilutive sources whenever possible, including from research and development tax credits or government assistance.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	The Corporation defines capital to include total shareholders&#8217; equity and derivative warrant liabilities.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	The Corporation&#8217;s policy is to maintain a minimal level of debt.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
	As of February 29, 2016, cash amounted to $3,026,943, short-term investments amounted to $7,443,115 and tax credits receivable amounted to $61,210, for a total of $10,531,268.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 10.25PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-LEFT: 17.85PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.9PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	111
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">

	SECTION 302 CERTIFICATION
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	I, Pierre Lemieux, certify that:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	I have reviewed this Annual Report on Form 20-F of Acasti Pharma Inc.;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="0AC63878291F40978D997B63691C2F93" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="C042F1DD4A6E4C538AEE8C68B4BE7C0D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	3.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="317D8665CDD845748A7CAA60B54161E1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.8PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	4.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	The registrant's other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d&#8211;15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="70CB0DD9CB4E4F778B0F0A8072BCF0D8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 57.6PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="043C02006C4F46759F198325B3420C6A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 57.6PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">

<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the period covered by the annual report that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 57.6PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the period covered by the annual report that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over financial reporting; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="420BF7F12F5347368E555D60F1FBAAE1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.8PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	5.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	The registrant's other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<BR>
</FONT>
	over financial reporting, to the registrant's auditors and the audit committee of the registrant's board of directors
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<BR>
</FONT>
	(or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="85DF5CA8FE724F2CA3F81F3A348B8E58" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 57.6PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="99B29F4267864952A6277746AFBBB14B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting.
</TD>
</TR>
